192639.name: CT Special Forces 3: Bioterror
192639.description:
From the back of the box:

A terrifying shadow darkens the oceans... The world's intelligence services suspect the evil terrorist organizations. These criminals would have created a new molecule capable of modifying human DNA. By reinforcing aggression and strength genes, they create a new breed of superwarriors.

Only the CT Special Forces can defeat such powerful enemies. You will need to lead your team through the most dangerous and demanding missions. Use your skills and all the modern weaponry available!

Put an end to the threat of terrorism!


An explosive combination of platform action and shoot'em up!



4 different characters to play



Exclusive new naval ops



Multiple game modes



Take advantage of over-equipped vehicles with huge firepower!



Defeat super bosses and terrifying mutant warriors!



New lethal state of the art weapons and vehicles including helicopters!

192640.name: The Darkness in Shadowturrets
192640.description:
From publisher blurb:

One of the most dangerous adventures written for Shadow of the Demon Lord, Forgotten Realms creator Ed Greenwood reveals a landscape beset by shuffling bones, bizarre magic, and hideous, alien monstrosities. Designed for a group of master characters, they will have to use every trick they have to survive the many perils waiting in the ruins of Shadowturrets!

192641.name: Skald
192641.description:
From publisher blurb:

The term skald (or skáld) meaning 'poet', is generally used for poets who composed at the courts of Scandinavian and Icelandic leaders during the Viking Age and Middle Ages.
Skalds are poets, historians, and keepers of lore who use their gifts for oration and song to inspire allies into a frenzied rage.

This edition of “Fantastic Feats” gives you ten feats for the Skald in your party.

The Skald can sometimes use their spell energy to provide a bonus to certain acts and this is reflected in the feats they can use.

Anthem of Attacking - Increase minimum melee damage
Ballard of Protection - A Bonus to saving throws
Chant of Performance - Perform Skill is now more
Fearsome Reputation - Intimidation/bluff checks can be re-rolled
Melody of Moods - Social dice rolls can be improved
Musical Weapon - Use your instrument as an improvised weapon
Poem of Power - You or your allies are now better
Saga of Defending - Makes it harder for your foes to get through your armour
Song of Inspiration - Gain a bonus to your next hit roll
Tale of Rage - Sacrifice spell power for more rage potency

192642.name: I Loot the Wizard's Body
192642.description:
From publisher blurb:

Adventurers are always looting the bodies of their vanquished foes. Often the GM simply reads off the villain’s equipment list and the players move on. In this situation, beyond armour, weapons, magic items and some coin most foes never seem to carry anything of minor interest. This doesn’t help the GM diligently trying to breathe life and verisimilitude into his campaign.

Enter I Loot the Wizard's Body. Within, find three tables packed full of trinkets, minor pieces of jewellery and other adornments along with the random things found in a villain’s pouch. Use them to enliven the looting in your campaign today!

192643.name: I Loot the Wizard's Body
192643.description:
From publisher blurb:

Adventurers are always looting the bodies of their vanquished foes. Often the GM simply reads off the villain’s equipment list and the players move on. 192644.name: Pitch
192644.description:
From publisher blurb:

Beware the viscous villainy of… Pitch!

A Power Level 11 Rogue, Pitch is a tricky criminal to fight in close quarters, and he knows it.. Pitch is an iconic character in the Beacon City universe, but can be dropped into any campaign with very little alteration.

Pitch’s file is designated “Red" to indicate that his powers seem to be a natural ability triggered by extreme circumstances. He is massive, strong, and his body is coated in a tarry substance that both protects him from harm and clings to anything it touches. He has learned to take advantage of this goop in his criminal exploits, making him an “untouchable” powerhouse on the streets. His interests in street racing and get-rich-quick schemes may put him at odds with heroes who protect the streets from dangerous threats in their city, while his poor choices and refusal to reform might bring him back into their neighborhood time and time again!

192645.name: The Noble Barbarian (Hybrid Class)
192645.description:
From publisher blurb:

This issue introduces a new hybrid class, the Noble Barbarian. Combining the Barbarian's rage ability and powers with the Paladin's deific auras and ability to heal, this hybrid class allows for a more savage based class that can share its strengths with others. New feats designed for the Noble Barbarian are included.

192646.description:
UNRELEASED GAME – AVAILABLE




This game is still either in Early-Alpha or Beta (or any status in between) but IS already available for sale / early access, so CAN BE PLAYED.




The world and style of TECHNOLUST are inspired by 1980’s and 90’s Cyberpunk fiction like Blade Runner, Neuromancer and Robocop. Join the resistance and help bring down the oppressive corporations… or just hang out at home and watch a movie with your artificial intelligence. Go to the arcade and experience new worlds or hack into secure networks and fight to set the truth free. As in the real world, the choice is yours. Gameplay in TECHNOLUST is based primarily around story driven exploration.

Source: The Game Website.

192647.name: I Expect You To Die
videogamehonor: 2015 Proto Awards Best Gameplay of the Year Winner
2015 Proto Awards Best Interaction Design of the Year Winner
2015 Proto Awards Best Overall Experience of the Year Winner
2015 Proto Awards Most Transportive Game of the Year Nominee

I Expect You to Die is a game that lets you step into the world of an elite secret agent to attempt to survive a series of deadly situations. The goal is to complete the mission using brain power, cunning and a top secret device that gives you the power of telekinesis.

Source: The Game Website.

192649.name: Lunadroid 237
videogamehonor: 2015 Proto Awards Best Soundtrack of the Year Nominee
192649.description:
Lunadroid takes place on The Moon on July 21, 1969. Part game, part animated sci-fi short film, it is inspired by exploration games like Myst and Dear Esther as well as sci fi films set in space like 2001 A Space Odyssey and Moon.

Source: The Game Website.

192650.name: theBlu: Encounter
videogamehonor: 2015 Proto Awards Best Art Direction of the Year Nominee
2015 Proto Awards Best Educational Experience Winner
2015 Proto Awards Best Mobile Experience of the Year Winner
2015 Proto Awards Best Sound Design of the Year Nominee
2016 Proto Awards Best Art Direction of the Year Nominee
2016 Proto Awards Most Transportive Game of the Year Winner
192650.description:
Live through the creatures in the ocean as they actually are, in their own habitat, untouched by humans—not in a zoo. And the stunning 3D graphics only add to the excitement of the fully immersive underwater journey that TheBluVR provides, whether you’re hanging out with orcas in the Arctic, chilling with dolphins near the beach, or staring into the eyes of an enormous blue whale.

Source: The Game Website.

192651.name: Skyworld
videogamehonor: 2015 Proto Awards Best GUI of the Year Nominee
192651.description:
UNRELEASED GAME – UNAVAILABLE




This game has officially been announced by the publisher or developer, but has not yet been released and made available for purchase. Therefore some of the information above may change in the future. Until this game is released, please do not submit images for it, nor add new releases. Press Kits are an exception and a maximum of six can be added.




User Summary

Manage your economy, build and lead royal armies and rule mad dragons to restore your father’s empire to its former glory.

192652.name: Vox Machinae
videogamehonor: 2015 Proto Awards Best Independent Experience of the Year Winner
192652.description:
UNRELEASED GAME – UNAVAILABLE




This game has officially been announced by the publisher or developer, but has not yet been released and made available for purchase. Therefore some of the information above may change in the future. Until this game is released, please do not submit images for it, nor add new releases. Press Kits are an exception and a maximum of six can be added.




As a migrant worker trained to operate the ultimate in heavy machinery, you'll be sent to far away worlds to further the interests of your employer. Usually you blast rocks to uncover precious minerals; with all the corporate rivalry going on in the space-age wild west you get the feeling you'll be asked to blast the competition as well. You hope you don't have to deal with the mercenaries the mining companies have been hiring. Then again... if you can't beat them, join them!

Source: The Game Website.

192653.name: Rune Lords 1
192653.description:
From publisher blurb:

Six Spectacular Mythic Monsters for your AP!

Mythic Module Monsters: Rune Lords 1 brings you mythic versions of all six monsters in the bestiary section of issue #1 in the official Rune Lords AP:

giant gecko
goblin dog
goblin snake
sinspawn
attic whisperer
devil steed




The Mythic Monster Manual and Mythic Monsters series from Legendary Games have greatly expanded the number of mythic monsters available for use in Pathfinder campaigns of any kind, but if you want to add a bit of mythic mayhem to the classic adventure paths produced by Paizo, Inc., the Mythic Module Monsters series is designed just for you! Rather than having to hunt through multiple books trying to find the odd monster here or there to enhance your adventure path experience, you'll find the monsters introduced in that AP right here, ready to pick up exactly the issues you need to enhance the mythic monsters in your favorite adventure! You can pick them up a few at a time or collect an entire series for your favorite AP!

192656.name: Nightmarium
192656.description:
A game about building nightmares so terrifying you’ll see half of them in your dreams afterwards. You have cards representing Night Terrors, and the more of them you combine in the right order, the more monsters will come to life, and the more horrifying they become. Create monsters that will make your opponents gasp in horror. Nourish them with your own fear and make them stronger. Only then will you achieve victory and become the Master of Terror!

Each Night Terror is also associated with one of four Legions of Horror: Necromunculi, Constricti, Mansters, or Chimeridae. A Terror's legion is indicated by the color of the card's background: blue stands for Necromunculi, brown for Constricti, green for Chimeridae, and red for Mansters. A creature can be made up of any Night Terrors, but players are better off weaving Creatures out of cards that all belong to the same legion.

The game continues until one of the players completes five Creatures—this player immediately becomes the winner.

During your turn you perform two actions, after which the next person to your left takes their his? turn. You can select any pair of actions out of three possibilities (you can also perform the same action twice).

Possible actions
A) Take a card from the deck
B) Discard as many cards as you like from your hand and take half that number from the deck
C) Play a card from your hand and activate a Creature abilities (if the Creature is complete).

As soon as you complete a Creature (by adding a head to torso), perform all of its abilities top to bottom, starting with the Creature's head, proceeding with its torso, and ending with its legs. Abilities are activated one at a time in a very specific order. You cannot refuse to perform the abilities.

If the completed Creature is comprised of Night Terrors
of the same legion (in other words, if all three cards that make up the Creature have the same background color), each of your opponents must discard one card of that legion from their hands before its abilities can be performed. If your opponent does not have an appropriate card, they must discard any two cards.
Creature Abilities

• Herald: turn over two cards form the deck. Place them in front of you according to the usual rules if you can. Discard any cards that you cannot play.
• Weeper: take any two cards from the deck.
• Mocker: play one card from your hand according to the usual rules.
• Executioner: add the top card from any other player's Creature to your hand.
• Scavenger: discard any vulnerable (incomplete) Creature.
• Devourer: discard the top card from any of your Creatures other than this one.

192657.name: Pinball Tycoon
videogameversion: North American Game Boy Advance edition
192657.description:
From the back of the box:

Pinball Tycoon is a pinball simulation featuring four themed tables:


California Gold Rush
Black Gold
Hollywood Mogul
Golden Chance


Each table has its own goals and objectives. Dig for gold in "California Gold Rush," strike oil in "Black Gold," become a multi millionaire in "Hollywood Mogul," and win a fortune in "Golden Chance."

Play for hi-score with up to 3 other players on one Game Boy Advance!

192658.name: Feats of Pride
192658.description:
From publisher blurb:

This installment of the More Feats! product line introduces a new kind of feat: the sin feat. Sin feats are designed to represent a character’s vices and moral failings, though they are by no means restricted to evil or non-good characters. Though a few sin feats are supernatural in nature, and some even grant bonuses of the profane type, characters of any faith or alignment may wrestle with sinful vices – grappling with and overcoming such a moral complication often serves to highlight a character’s heroism.

Feats of Pride includes thirteen new feats for wrathful sinners: Bask in Adoration, Boundless Pride, Choose Your Champion, Dazzling Genius, Illusory Invincibility, Leave Him to Me!, Prideful Spell, Rivalry of Pride, It Is I!, Savage Delight, Show Them How It's Done, Silence Fools! and Surrounded by Imbeciles!

192659.name: Expanded Skill Use For Blue Planet
192659.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Synergy game system that powers Blue Planet has a quick and simple task resolution that is well suited to the action and intrigue of the Blue Planet milieu. However, there are times when game moderators may want more than a simple success or failure result.

The action value subsystem that is already part of Synergy measures degrees of success and failure. This rules expansion will show you how to use action values, adding a system for benefits, complications, and catastrophes to give skill task rolls more variety in your Blue Planet games.

This is a rules expansion for the Blue Planet™ roleplaying game. Undercurrents are an irregular publication, covering adventures, technology, fiction, and other articles for use with Blue Planet™. Watch out for more Undercurrents, coming soon from Capricious Games!

192660.name: Het wijnspel
192660.description:
Trivia game with 280 questions about wine. Contents:
56 quizcards
4 winecards
1 die

The goal of the game is collecting 8 grapes for the winecard by correctly answering wine-themed questions. A small element of chance is added by the die: On a roll of 1-2 the player gets a multiple choice question (which rewards 1 grape), on 3-5 an open question (which rewards 2 grapes). The player's turn is lost on a roll of 6 or a wrong answer.

192661.description:
Description from the publisher:

They thought the secret of Warwick mansion had been solved and the spirit had found peace, but now new signs have emerged that were previously hidden. New suspects, places, and objects that do not fit into the picture — and the presence of the ghost is strong once again.

In Mysterium: Hidden Signs, the spiritualists must return to the old mansion and investigate these disturbing visions. Will they understand all the instructions this time and give the ghost its final rest?
192661.name: Mysterium: Hidden Signs

Ep 043 – Essen Part II Expansion Preview
Episode 31: The Networks Review + Gencon 2016 Preview

192662.name: A Friend in Need (Hero Kids)
192662.description:
From publisher blurb:

Playground Adventures brings you kid friendly gaming in this adorable tale of friendship and fun!

Kurisutaru is an orphaned crystal dragon! When his mother disappears, he finds himself all alone in an abandoned monastery. After years spent with only constructs for company, he leaves to find a true forever friend and playmate. When he stumbles upon Azumi, he naively kidnaps the young magical prodigy with a gift for origami. The dragon scares the girl but she does her best to reach out to would-be rescuers! Can the PCs follow a trail of clues to save both Azumi and Kurisutaru from the dragon’s loneliness?

A Friend in Need is a stand-alone mini-adventure for the Hero Kids roleplaying game system. Recommended for ages four and up this module includes adventure content as well as advice for gaming with children.

192663.description:
Become a Fleet Commander, pick up your fleet, choose your weapons and enter the battle. Lead your mighty warships to victory and your name will stand for the one of a wise strategist and an enlightened tactician.

Fleet Commander is a space battle game for 2 to 4 players. The game is fast and aggressive; set it up in less than 1 minute and play it in less than 1 hour! The rules are so simple and the mechanics so deep that you can as much teach it to young children than experiment epic tactical team battles with experienced players.

Fleet Commander - Genesis includes:
The equivalent of 2 Fleet Commander:1 - Ignition
Fleet Commander:2 - Beyond the Gate
50 tiles for a modular board
engraved dice
...
192663.name: Fleet Commander: Genesis

192664.name: Universal Adventures Adventure Module FG3: The Beast of Blackstone Tomb
192664.description:
From publisher blurb:

Return to the Forgotten Graveyard and discover what lurks within the depths of Blackstone Tomb!

Wolf goblins have been seen coming and going from the Forgotten Graveyard in growing numbers. Tracks of massive wolves have been found in the area. And the savagely-mauled remains of local residents and animals alike have been found in fields and pens. Were they the victims of goblin attacks or has an unknown beast been released from the hidden depths of Blackstone Tomb?

Universal Adventures The Beast of Blackstone Tomb is a new Adventure Module set within The Forgotten Graveyard, which is located along the western edge of Greyshroud Ridge. You can play the adventure independently or combine the adventure with The Forgotten Graveyard, Expedition to Erathor and the expansion pack, Greyshroud Ridge, to create an overland journey, above ground encounters and a campaign. In addition, you can also use The Tomb of Mergal Thar as an additional adventure site. The Adventure Module includes a new Adventure Record, 9 Adventure cards, 9 Encounter cards, 9 Event cards, 9 Search cards, 18 Treasure cards, and a free set of Sarcophagus cards.

Gather your heroes, plan your expedition and enter Blackstone Tomb, if you dare. Suitable for use with any fantasy role playing game, The Beast of Blackstone Tomb can be played solo or with a group, with or without a GM. The adventure is highly re-playable and compatible with other Universal Adventures cards. In addition, you can combine the cards with other cards from the series, or cards from other Universal Adventures products, to create your own adventures.

The Adventure Module is a new, simple way to play fantasy adventures. The organization and presentation of the adventures allows for quick setup, quick play and gives you the ability to focus on the action and “story” while leaving you the option to include tactical action and combat if you desire. Enter a new and exciting world of adventure, full of wonder and surprises.

192665.name: Newt Class Scout
192665.description:
From publisher blurb:

This product is a little booklet of a Traveller compatible starship. The space craft introduced in this installment of the series is a small 100 dT scout.

The PDF contains the background of the ship, statistics for it and its crew. In addition the document contains simple deckplans (Without scale or grid!) of the ship and images showing the ship from various directions.

192666.name: Mythic Magic Expanded
192666.description:
From publisher blurb:

Created in conjunction with d20PFSRD and Rogue Genius Games, the Four Horsemen are ready to show you how to do more with Mythic Magic than just expend a point from a pool! With Mythic Magic Expanded, you learn the secrets of Blood Rituals, gather worshipers together to call on Mortal Faith, weave your sagas into near reality with Storytelling, empower the things you craft with ancient Sigils, concentrate the power of the world into massive Monuments, or use mythic energies to craft Warding Circles to deal with outsiders.

192667.name: Recluse
192667.description:
From publisher blurb:

Recluse is a young, idealistic hero granted the powers of the spider, which are great when facing a villain, and of no use whatsoever when dealing with every other aspect of life.

Iconic Legends. Because sometimes you a need a character everyone knows, even if they're meeting them for the first time.

192668.description:
Note: Publisher is out of stock of Flag Dash until Ultra PRO Entertainment releases a reprint in March 2017. There are a limited number of copies remaining at select FLGS and a few online retailers. Retailer List

In Flag Dash, you play as one of several childhood friends who promised to play their favorite pastime again after they "grew up." Secretly plan your moves to outmaneuver the opposing team in an exciting game of capture the flag! Will your opponents ruin your plans, or will you return home victoriously with the flag?

Choose from 6 fun characters with unique player powers and beautiful illustrations, including the Wanna-be Ninja, Modern Cowboy, & Crazy Cat Lady! No two games are alike since there are many gameplay variations.

FEATURES


Tactical planning, guessing, and teamwork
Simple to learn but great depth of gameplay
Wooden game pawns carry wooden flags
Family friendly board game of capture the flag
Movement programming mechanic


GAMEPLAY

Flag Dash takes place over multiple rounds until one team returns home with the opposing team's flag or collects a complete set of flags the opposing characters are wearing. In every round, each player plans two moves in advance and for each move, chooses to move either the runner they control — with a unique special ability — or the defender they share with their teammate.

ROUND SUMMARY

PHASE 1: PLAN MOVES - Each player secretly plans two moves with an action card and priority token face-down for each move.

PHASE 2: RESOLVE MOVES (2X) - Each player reveals their priority token for the first move. Each player makes their first move in order from lowest to highest numbered token and discards their priority token. Repeat for second move.

PHASE 3: CLEANUP - Each player returns action cards to hand.

COMPONENTS


6 wooden pawns
2 wooden flags
32 action cards
6 character cards
78 game tokens
7 other wooden pieces
4 player screens to hide tokens
1 double-sided game board
Rulebook
192668.name: Flag Dash

Flag Dash and Kirk Dennison
The Long View - Quick Looks #23

192669.name: Low Life: The Rise of the Lowly Boss Blocker
192669.description:
From publisher blurb:

This incredibly useful accessory for the Low Life: The Rise of the Lowly RPG helps the Boss keep all her private jazz concealed from the eyes of snooping players. It's a veritable overflowing cornucopia of charts and information useful to the game, arranged for easy perusal and quick reference. Also included FOR FREE in this digital pack are a full color Map of Oith, a Low Life Peepfolio character sheet, and the Marshfellow, a brand new playable character species!

192670.name: Mauseschlau & Bärenstark: Fit und Clever – Das knifflige Bewegungsdomino
192670.description:
From the back of the box:

Who will manage to balance the game box on their head, clap their hands behind their back or walk like a robot? And who knows what fits together: Horse and Banana or Horse and Dog? Hat and Goat or Hat and Coat?

Two games in one package which will not only make you fit but clever, too!

On one hand the well-loved Fit and Clever movement domino with all-new actions for the younger kids, on the other hand the new Fit and Clever allocation domino for the older kids.

192671.name: The Secret World - Issue 1: Unleashed
192671.description:
New Missions:


An action mission set at the Innsmouth Academy on Solomon Island, where the player gets to know more about the exceptionally gifted student Carter.



Crime and Punishment: Bestselling horror author Sam Krieg came to Solomon Island to write his latest novel -- but there's more to it than that. Through this investigation, the player will dig into Krieg's works and the mind of an obsessed fan to learn more about the dark and hidden history of Solomon Island.



The 3rd Age: There have been Ages before ours, and the evidence lies beneath. In Egypt, the sand is thin, and the remnants of past Ages are beginning to spread their influence across the world. The Seven Sentinels hold the key to an investigation that begins in the present, and delves deep into the distant past.


But that's not all! Another mission awaits observant players on Solomon Island -- one that explores a character that may be more than she pretends to be...

Two dungeons are receiving new Nightmare modes: The Ankh and Hell Fallen.

Increased challenges, increased rewards, and a chance to test new builds, new synergies and to put your team to the test against some of the toughest and fiercest challenges in The Secret World!

Unleashed also contains the brand new, cross-dimensional Marketplace, allowing players to sell, trade and ship items to other players, no matter where they're playing. The Marketplace will be an integral part of The Secret World's growing economy, giving players more flexibility when it comes to how they equip their characters, and how they procure PAX.

Source: The Publisher Website.

192672.name: The Secret World - Issue 2: Digging Deeper
192672.description:
Introducing a brand new weapon, featuring seven brand new abilities, wrapped in a brand new auxiliary wheel! With the addition of a third weapon and eighth ability hot-bar slot, you can now augment your existing decks with the awesome might of the rocket launcher. The rocket launcher that goes 'Boom!'.

Inside an abandoned abattoir in the bowels of Brooklyn, the infamous Dr Anton Aldini (Peter Stormare) has set up his paraplastic surgery -- the Modern Prometheus -- and on September 11th, his practice will be open for business. With the Modern Prometheus, we're introducing new heads and new facial features, allowing players to completely alter the way their characters look. The first visit is free, but subsequent nips and tucks will cost PAX. Coupons will also be made available in the item store for those players who are short on in-game cash.

'Digging Deeper' continues the story that began with The Kingsmouth Code, and sends players back to Pastor Henry Hawthorne at the Kingsmouth Congregational to dig deeper into the town's secret history and Illuminati legacy

Two additional dungeons are receiving Nightmare modes in issue #2: The Facility and Hell Eternal.

Source: The Publisher Website.

192673.description: The first expedition to Mars ended with a heroic fight by the astronauts for survival and initiated the first mission aimed at colonizing the planet, which was financed by four corporations. Now in Martians: A Story of Civilization the human colony on Mars, managed by leaders of the corporations, has to explore the planet in search of necessary resources, build new constructions, and develop technologies adjusted to planetary conditions. Such effort is necessary not only to survive, but also to create better living standards for future generations raised by colonists.
192673.name: Martians: A Story of Civilization

Cult of the New Board Game Podcast Episode 024 – Top 10 iOS Games
Episode 31: The Networks Review + Gencon 2016 Preview
Episode 36 :: Essen 2016 Preview + Stephanie Straw Interview

192675.name: The Secret World - Issue 3: The Cat God
192675.description:
The event and the Cat God himself will make their appearance in October as we are getting closer to Halloween, so look forward to a phone call from an old acquaintance to set you off.

Halloween will offer several missions which set off a brand new storyline and a brand new villain, both of which we'll get back to further down the road.

In addition to fresh content, such as new locations and monsters, our Halloween event also brings with it tricks, treats, cool new costumes and special pets.

Source: The Publisher Website.

192676.name: The Secret World - Issue 4: Big Trouble in the Big Apple
192676.description:
You can enjoy a new Auxiliary Weapon – the Chainsaw, huge PvP enhancements, the Albion Theatre, Reticule Combat and a new set of Missions!

Terrible creatures from beyond are attacking New York City. The players must band together in groups of ten to take on this threat. They will travel through the subways, streets and buildings of the city before arriving at Times Square for the showdown with the final boss.

Our Player vs. Player systems are also getting a huge boost in this Issue. There are new missions in Fusang Projects and the PVP reward system is getting a revamp. These changes give the conflict between the Secret Societies more meaning, persistence and make it even more rewarding. Balance in the fight between Secret Societies is also being closely looked at, both for minigames and in the Warzone. An example of this is the new Underdog mission in Fusang, where the weakest side can gain the help of a powerful Custodian.

Another brand new feature is the Albion Theatre in London. Here teams of players can rent the stage and put on any plays their creative minds can dream up. They can choose between using a host of backdrops, setpieces, cutouts, effects and sounds to set the stage exactly as they like. They can then tell other players about their show in the city wide chat channel, in Agartha or in the forums, so anyone can come and watch.

Source: The Publisher Website.

192677.name: The Secret World - Issue 5: The Vanishing of Tyler Freeborn
192677.description:
The apocalypse is coming just as the Mayans predicted. In The Secret World this will take the form of an End of Days event filled with new monsters and challenges. The Oxford archeologists in the Scorched Desert and the Morninglight have important tasks for you. Slay the newly risen Mayan zombies, the roaming Harbingers and the god of the nine Underworlds and be rewarded with special loot and prizes.

Warp time and space itself with the powerful Quantum Brace. Help out Moose and Edgar in Kingsmouth with their experiments and build the new Auxiliary Weapon yourself through trial and error. Each attack of the Quantum Brace exists in two states – hit successfully with one and the icon on your action bar will change and reveal a follow up attack. The Quantum Brace is great for doing damage to both single targets and groups, but can also be an especially handy tool for healers.

Source: The Developer Website.

192678.name: The Secret World - Issue 6: The Last Train to Cairo
192678.description:
Members now get a three day head start on the brand new story line and main content in the Issue, while the rest of the new stuff, general updates and fixes will be available for everyone.

In this update you will play through a new, deep and revealing story within Egypt, learn how to use the vicious Whip Auxiliary Weapon, experience many PvP enhancements, get a new Veteran and Recruitment system and face off against a terrible Raid size Lair boss in a prison between worlds. While playing through the new story line in Issue #6 you can also acquire the all new Whip Auxiliary Weapon.

An all new Veteran system is introduced with this update. Every member now gets Veteran Points for each month they are or have been a member. Anyone recruiting a new player also gets Veteran Points equal to one month of membership. These points can buy unique rewards, such as cool new clothing or handy utility items.

Source: The Publisher Website.

192679.name: Also
192679.description:
A game that trains logical thinking. The game can be played as a betting game on the truth of implications or just to be the first to find if an implication is correct or not.

Example:
A statement and an implication is selected:
When Betty is reading a book she does not want to be disturbed.
Betty does not read a book. Therefore she can be disturbed.

With the game material (logical matrix) you can prove that this implication is not correct: ((p --> -q) and -p) --> q

If the implication is revised in the following way, the implication is true ((p --> -q) and q) --> -p:
When Betty is reading a book she does not want to be disturbed.
Betty can be disturbed. Therefore she is not reading a book.

This is a game for true mathematical nerds!

From the box:

ALSO makes you

fit in controlled thinking
precise in phrasing
invulnerable in discussing
excellent in solving brainteasers




ALSO-players know the rules of precise thinking.

192680.name: Cariso
192680.description:
Psychological game or training for self-discovery and group dynamics.
Up to 8 players can participate. On a players turn he draws a card of a selected difficulty level (beginners, advanced, professional) and decides to fulfill one of the tasks of that card (red = creativity, yellow = interaction/confrontation, blue = self-discovery, green = articulation). The other players decide how good the task was performed and the active player received rewards in coloured tiles that he can place on the board in the pattern he likes.
Over the time the board is filled with the patterns of the individual players. You can play either until the board is filled or for a certain time. All players are winners as they know more about themselves than before.

192681.name: The Secret World - Issue 7: A Dream to Kill
192681.description:
A Dream to Kill, offers a crucial new chapter in The Secret World’s story line, and sets up the story for Tokyo. In this update you get to play out your secret agent fantasies in Transylvania, with deep intrigue, a high speed snowmobile chase through the mountains, learn the new Auxiliary Weapon the Flamethrower and finally stand face to face with an ominous enemy which has remained hidden up until now.

This update lets you acquire and learn how to use the brutal Flamethrower Auxiliary Weapon. Get the parts needed from Vampire Hunter in the Besieged Farmlands and be on the lookout for a way to infuse the weapon with Anima so it can achieve its full power.

Source: The Publisher Website.

192682.name: The Secret World - Issue 8: The Venetian Agenda
192682.description:
Scenarios are a completely fresh type of content which offer virtual training in the headquarters of The Council of Venice. Augments give a rich new layer to character development, by letting you enhance your Active Abilities with powerful Augments, giving you more tactical choices than ever before! By defeating bosses and completing the Scenarios you get rewarded with powerful Augments. The all new Augment System lets you fine tune your Abilities by giving them additional effects.

Enjoy ten new Item Missions on Solomon Island, each containing an exclusive scary story. Or take on the ominous Cat God in his chain of missions, and see Stonehenge in its ancient form! Halloween also offers many new and exclusive rewards and outfits, such as the ominous Plague Doctor outfit available in the Item Store.

Source: The Publisher Website.

192683.name: The Secret World - Issue 9: The Black Signal
192683.description:
Continue the story from Venice before you head out to Tokyo to take on the brand new challenges which await you there. Travel through the devastated subway, the place where it all began, and enter the besieged city itself. New characters, fresh monsters, exciting locations and challenging quests. In addition you can enjoy the all new AEGIS system, which lets you equip a fresh set of equipment and weapon controllers.

Source: The Publisher Website.

192684.name: The Secret World - Issue 10: Nightmares in the Dream Palace
192684.description:
Venture out of the quarantine zone in Tokyo and continue the main story as you explore new areas, fight new enemies, meet a new cast of characters and uncover old secrets. A virulent new strain of the ever evolving Filth is spreading from the Tokyo docks. But new Orochi research is ready to meet this menace. Get your hands on the all new AEGIS shields, which will help defend you from the monsters in Tokyo.

This update opens up big new areas of Tokyo. Explore the haunted Orochi Tenements. These houses used to be filled with the workers of the Orochi corporation. Horrors and demons now stalk the corrupted streets. Travel to the docks and take on all new monsters and an evolved strain of Filth. This new threat has been spreading from a cargo ship, containing creatures from another continent.

You can now get your hands on even more powerful Orochi technology. The all new AEGIS shields will give you an added defense against the powerful creatures of Tokyo. You can swap between three different types of shields, depending on which type of enemy you face. All new upgrades for these shields have also become available, so you can customize your character's AEGIS equipment as you see fit.

Source: The Publisher Website.

192685.name: Troll dich!
192685.description: Simple dice game. The setup consists of each player placing his pawns in a row on one side of the board. The goal is to be the first in reaching the opposite side with all his pawns. Pawns are moved by rolling a die and can only move within the own column. You can throw back other players pawns by ending your move on the same field.

192687.name: Wings of Glory: World War 1 – Sopwith Camel
boardgameexpansion: Wings of Glory: WW1 Airplane Packs
Wings of Glory: WW1 Duel Pack
Wings of Glory: WW1 Rules and Accessories Pack
Wings of Glory: WW1 Special Packs
boardgamefamily: Wings of Glory / Wings of War
boardgameversion: Wings of Glory: World War 1: Sopwith Camel: Barker
Wings of Glory: World War 1: Sopwith Camel: Elwood
Wings of Glory: World War 1: Sopwith Camel: Stackard
192687.description:
Publisher Blurb:

The Sopwith Camel was a British single-seat biplane, introduced on the Western Front in 1917. It was a superlative fighter, credited with shooting down 1,294 enemy aircraft, more than any other Allied fighter. It also served as a ground-attack aircraft, especially near the end of the conflict. in the air-to-air role by newer fighters. In the hands of an experienced pilot, its maneuverability was unmatched by any contemporary aircraft. Major William Barker's Sopwith Camel became the most successful fighter aircraft in the history of the RAF. Designed to be used with the popular air combat game system created by Andrea Angiolino and Pier Giorgio Paglia, each WW1 Wings of Glory Airplane Pack is a ready-to-play model, painted and assembled, 100% compatible with any other WW1 Wings of Glory game product. In each pack you will find all you need to play with the airplane: a special base with gaming stats, a variable altitude flying stand, and a specific deck of maneuver cards.

192688.name: The Secret World - Issue 11: Reaping the Whirlwind
192688.description:
Play now to take on the mighty Orochi corporation and all of its subsidiaries. The massive Orochi tower awaits! Fight your way to the top and take on all new enemies. Stand face to face with the terrors which await you, and take the next step into an even greater reality. Gain the access codes you need to travel all the way to the top boardroom.

This story is continued in Tokyo, and at the end of Issue #11 you learn some of the consequences of your choices. Many secrets are finally revealed and you get to understand the true power struggle which is happening behind the scenes. You also get a taste of the ultimate power, and realize the cost of crossing someone who is eternal.

Source: The Publisher Website.

192689.name: Wings of Glory: World War 2 – FW-190 D-9/D-13
boardgameexpansion: Wings of Glory: WW2 Rules and Accessories Pack
Wings of Glory: WW2 Starter Set
boardgamefamily: Wings of Glory / Wings of War
boardgameversion: Wings of Glory: World War 2: FW-190 D-13: 7./JG 26
Wings of Glory: World War 2: FW-190 D-13: Gotz
Wings of Glory: World War 2: FW-190 D-13: Wubke
192689.description:
Publisher Blurb:

The Focke-Wulf FW-190 Würger (Shrike) was a German single-seat, single-engine fighter aircraft designed by Kurt Tank in the late 1930s and widely used during World War II. The FW-190 D (nicknamed the Dora) was intended to improve on the high-altitude performance of the A-series enough to make it useful against the American heavy bombers. However, the circumstances of the war in late 1944 meant that fighter-versus-fighter combat and ground attack missions took priority. Great Aces that gloriously piloted this aircraft included Franz Götz and Waldemar Wübke. Designed to be used with the popular air combat game system created by Andrea Angiolino and Pier Giorgio Paglia, each WW2 Wings of Glory Airplane Pack is a ready-to-play model, painted and assembled, 100% compatible with any other WW2 Wings of Glory game product. In each pack you will find all you need to play with the airplane: a special base with gaming stats, a variable altitude flying stand, and a specific deck of maneuver cards. Larger maneuver cards (63 x 88 mm) are included with this model, to handle the fast movement of this airplane.

192691.name: Wings of Glory: World War 2 – P-51D Mustang
boardgameexpansion: Wings of Glory: WW2 Rules and Accessories Pack
Wings of Glory: WW2 Starter Set
boardgamefamily: Wings of Glory / Wings of War
boardgameversion: Wings of Glory: World War 2: P-51D Mustang: Ellington
Wings of Glory: World War 2: P-51D Mustang: Landers
Wings of Glory: World War 2: P-51D Mustang: Saks
192691.description:
Publisher Blurb:

The North American Aviation P-51 Mustang was an American long-range, single-seat fighter and fighter-bomber used during World War II. The P-51s were used by the USAAF's Eighth Air Force to escort bombers in raids over Germany. The RAF's 2 TAF and the USAAF's Ninth Air Force used them as fighter-bombers, roles in which the Mustang helped to achieve air superiority in 1944. This aircraft was used in North Africa, Mediterranean Sea and Italy. Great Aces that gloriously piloted this aircraft included John Landers, Williams Saks and Spurgeon Ellington. Designed to be used with the popular air combat game system created by Andrea Angiolino and Pier Giorgio Paglia, each WW2 Wings of Glory Airplane Pack is a ready-to-play model, painted and assembled, 100% compatible with any other WW2 Wings of Glory game product. In each pack you will find all you need to play with the airplane: a special base with gaming stats, a variable altitude flying stand, and a specific deck of maneuver cards. Larger maneuver cards (63 x 88 mm) are included with this model, to handle the fast movement of this airplane.

192693.name: The Secret World - Sidestories: Further Analysis
videogamecompilation: The Secret World - Issue 15: The Sleuth's Gallery
192693.description:
Further Analysis gives you the chance to delve into four brand new Investigation Missions! Hone your puzzle solving skills and play through four fresh stories spread throughout the game world. En epic reward, The Inspector's Gadget and a Deep Mystery Box, awaits those who complete all four missions!

In The Animate Clay you return to Dr Anton Aldini in New York and follow the trail of one of his lost creations as it struggles to find its purpose. Trials of the Dragon starts you off in the Shadowy Forest and lets you explore the monster hunting prowess of your old friends, Tibor and Luminita. Here you get the opportunity to undergo the Draculesti trials to become a true monster hunter.

Source: The Publisher Website.

192694.name: The Secret World - Sidestories: The Last Pagan
videogamecompilation: The Secret World - Issue 15: The Sleuth's Gallery
192694.description:
Jump into Tokyo and play six all new missions. Take on both deep investigations, brutal action and tricky sabotage. Sidestories: The Last Pagan offers hours of new gameplay where you get to explore a massive Flappy nest and plan your very own bank heist! Complete all the missions and get your hands on the awesome Lorenzian Fabricator, which lets you teleport directly into Tokyo from anywhere in the world and a Deep Mystery Box to boot!

The six new missions are not all that is new in Tokyo. After very helpful community feedback the AEGIS system has also gotten an update. Now you can train the two new Efficiency and Proficiency Skills to master AEGIS to a much greater extent than before!

Source: The Publisher Website.

192695.name: The Secret World - Sidestories: Love & Loathing
videogamecompilation: The Secret World - Issue 15: The Sleuth's Gallery
192695.description:
Enjoy the brand new Sidestories: Love & Loathing, which offers five new missions in the city of Tokyo. Anyone who completes all five missions in Sidestories: Love & Loathing will receive the Cracked Noh mask and a Deep Mystery Box as rewards! (This Deep Mystery Box can only be gotten once on each account.)

The five new missions are an excellent source for the new Sequins of Sunrise tokens in Tokyo, which you can use to upgrade your AEGIS Weapon Controllers. Doing these missions while the anniversary bonus of 50% more research XP is active, is a great way to improve your AEGIS skill!

Source: The Publisher Website.

192696.name: Orphans & Ashes
192696.description:
Based on popular fantasy web comic Looking For Group, Orphans & Ashes is a race between Cale and Richard through a burning orphanage, with orphan lives on the line! Play as Cale and do your best to rescue the orphans, or play as Richard and harvest these innocent souls before the fire gets them first.

Every turn is divided into two phases: the action phase and the fire phase. During the action phase, you have three actions to use and seven actions from which to choose: Move your pawn; Guide an orphan; Put out a fire; Stop, drop, and roll; or your character's special action. During the fire phase, roll to see how many fires spread, following the immutable rules of the fire phase.

Cale's player gets to use the pawn's unique orphan-hauling grip. Cale's arms are designed to hook onto the orphans' hands, allowing our elven hero to carry the orphans he saves with him.

Richard uses the red fire pawns that, like the yellow fire pawns going around the orphanage, clip to the base of the pawns they set on fire.

Orphans & Ashes is a fast-paced two-player tile-laying game with push-your-luck and dexterity elements that plays in 45-60 minutes. The game contains over one hundred plastic pieces, including more miniature orphans than any other game on the market, guaranteed.

192698.name: The Secret World - Issue 12: To the Dark Tower Below
192698.description:
Get access to an all new Dungeon in Tokyo, The Manufactory, underneath the massive Orochi tower. We are introducing the all new Challenge system! You can enjoy four Daily and seven Weekly Challenges which will offer great rewards. These Challenges may for example ask you to do specific Missions, take on Dungeons, complete Scenarios or take part in Player versus Player battles.

The Secret World has many tokens and currencies. From Sequins to Marks of Venice or Aurei of Initiation, to name a few. When Issue #12 launches all these types of tokens will be combined into a single type - Black Bullion. You will be able to acquire Black Bullion from most of the content in the game, like Missions, Dungeons, PvP or Scenarios etc, and you will be able to use these tokens to get your hands on almost anything.

We are also introducing the new Marks of the Pantheon as an even more valuable type of token. You will be able to use these new tokens to improve Weapons and Talismans to all new heights of power! You will need Marks of the Pantheon to improve your Epic gear from 10.5 to 10.7. You can get these new tokens through the Daily Challenges or from defeating the toughest Dungeon bosses in the game.

You will be able to battle brutal world bosses without taking part in any special event. The final challenge in the Lair system is no longer the Eidolon, but instead three huge bosses from each of the main regions of the game.

Source: The Publisher Website.

192699.name: The Secret World - Issue 13: Trail of Shadows
192699.description:
Several new missions that revisit your favorite survivors of Kaidan, including Harumi & Yuichi’s delving into the mysteries of Orochi, and Ricky Pagan with a final, urgent request with his chrome steed:

Ride in style.

You will even come face-to-face with the darkest of the shadows as you make your final stops in Tokyo.

Source: The Publisher Website.

192700.name: Rogue Moon
192700.description:
By 2213, the religions and governments of Earth have separated into various factions competing for resources and technology. The most powerful of these empires, The Genesis, employ strict laws and draconian influence. More than half their population has been imprisoned aboard hulking generation ships. Treated as separate colonies, these ships vie for their rightful access to dwindling basic needs. Among the rising tensions is a small group of outlaws guided by a mysterious puppet master. Could they be the key to saving the galaxy? Or are they part of its endless entropy?

Rogue Moon is a branching path co-operative game set in a dark science fiction universe.

Players take on the role of one of several criminals that have been jettisoned in an escape pod when their transport ship was mysteriously attacked. As a team, the players will complete objectives guided by a mysterious figure calling himself the "Broker".

Players explore derelict space stations made of quantum matter - making every station different from the last.

Rogue Moon leverages a scenario book full of campaign missions with branching paths based on individual decisions and completed or failed objectives. Throughout the course of the game, players will discover the hidden secrets of each character and their roles in a galactic-wide conflict.

Form a team

There are heroes among the bad as well as the good. Play as criminals including a smuggler, bounty hunter, and war profiteerer
Different characters unlock different paths in the storyline




Fight for survival

Each character has unique abilities powered by a shared pool of limited energy
Depleted energy entropies into the fuel of enemies
Resolve combat and defense in a single dice roll




Discover the mystery behind your choices

Through decisions and actions, some, all, or none of you can earn your freedom
Unravel the identity of the Broker and his plans for you and your crew
There's more than one way to serve a life sentence




Featuring miniatures and vibrant sci-fi artwork, Rogue Moon is another tale ready to be lost to the infinite of space.

192701.description:
Description from the publisher:

To earn your living as an artist — that would really be something. But what can you do if you're not creative?

In Final Touch, players hire themselves out as art forgers willing to copy the masterworks of great artists, with all of them competing to create — or rather, re-create — the same image. But only the player who uses the right colors to finish the image will receive money for their work, and this skill is sure to reveal the best painter...or the best bluffer...

In more detail, players play "Touch of Color" cards from their hand to either improve or smear the forgery, working both together and against their fellow painters. The first player to put the final touch on any forgery in the making earns the money for that forgery, while smearing pays out to their opponents and moves them on to the larger paydays. The first artist to earn $25 by putting the final touch of paint on a forged painting wins!
192701.name: Final Touch
boardgamepodcastepisode: Episode 63 - Cry Havoc
Episode 86- Terraforming Mars and Game Therapy

192703.description: With the Forge mini-expansion, you will be able to add to your fleet some of the most powerful and sophisticated warships ever seen in the galaxy. Using the hulls of standard warships, the Forge managed to develop new mix of capacities according the requirements of their customers. As a Commander of the Hegemony of Amycles add now the dangerous class 2 Assault-ship and class 3 Gun-ship to your fleet. As a Phebean Commander, count on the fast Strategic Cruiser and the sturdy Turtle Ship to master the battle zone. Finally, intelligence agencies intercepted transmissions about "specific special weapons" to system PA-FF-104. Does the Forge of Fendrix already equipped Battleships with such unique devices or is it still only plans? The answer is in the battle to come.
192703.name: Fleet Commander: Forge

192706.name: Barney Brown and the Chicago Connection
192706.description:
User Summary

Barney Brown and the Chicago Connection, or Barney Brown part I, is a text adventure with graphics by Mandy Rodriguez. The game is made using GAC. The player takes the role as Barney Brown, and need to help the partner agent Roger Ranger of MI5. The aim is to find a secret file and bring it to him in Chicago.

192707.name: GravBlocks
192707.description:
GravBlocks is both a falling-block puzzle game (like Tetris) and a match-three puzzle game (like Pokemon Puzzle League, Bejeweled), but is also drastically different than either of those titles. The most unique aspect of GravBlocks is the aptly named Gravity Blocks. Aligning three of these blocks facing the same direction will alter gravity to that direction. So if you align three “left arrow” Gravity Blocks, then the gravity will shift to the left side of the screen, and the left wall now becomes the floor, with the opposite wall being the new ceiling where blocks drop in.

In the most basic aspect of the game (and also the original gameplay mode), players change gravity in order to build score multipliers, but must do it carefully! The walls contain hazards, and the higher the difficulty level and the longer the player plays, the more Destruction Hazards there will be to contend with! Dropping blocks into these Hazards resets the score Multiplier.

In order to survive this ordeal, players use Wild Blocks to temporarily close all the Hazards (for about 12 seconds) so that they can change gravity safely. There are also Bomb Blocks which will destroy all of one (or more, if you’re really clever) block type onscreen at once.

Source: The Developer Website.

192709.name: Roleplaying Tips (Issue 644)
rpgissuearticle: D12 Reasons Why Plant Monsters and Slimes Might Exist

192710.name: Roleplaying Tips (Issue 645)
rpgissuearticle: How to Make a Villain-Based Plot Engine

192711.description:
From the publisher:

"The Guédé", a small uncharted archipelago in the Western Atlantic. Ship-wrecked seafarers wash ashore in droves to the small rocky island chain. These scared islanders cling together in small groups, drinking rain water and hunting for any food they can find on the islands. Something is in the water however, and after only a few days a paranoia hijacks the islanders. Compelled by a blinding bloodlust, the islanders begin to butcher one another. Day after day the pale sun rises to watch these islanders hunt each other in a demented fury. And day after day, more islanders wash ashore this forlorn archipelago only to be tainted by a toxic curse that festers in these waters…

Forlorn is a ‘Survival, Team Strategy Game’. There are several different game modes that are played using ‘Islanders’. There are 31 Islanders that each function differently. Use your Islanders to compliment one another to defeat your opponents.

Forlorn is typically played with 2-4 players, however Last Man standing can be played with 8. The game modes are Capture the Flagon, King of the Hill, Regicide, and Last Man Standing.

Each game mode has a different objective, winning the objective earns a player 5 victory points and ends the game. Additionally each islander kill is worth 2 Victory points, and a sailor (a minion) is wort 1 Victory point.

This way a player that engages strategically and racks up kills can beat a player that camps and wins the game objective.

Forlorn has been tested for nearly 2 years and has come to a version that favors strategy, decisive thinking and psychology. Forlorn ultimately is a bloody strategy game with 4,495 possible different team combinations, 4 different game modes and 2-8 possible players.
192711.name: Forlorn

192713.name: Ninja: Silent But Deadly
192713.description:
Ninjas! Their very name conjures images of black-clad, highly trained assassins. Now, the mystique and power can be yours to use as you see fit.

Ninja: Silent But Deadly is more than just a game; it's a metagame to be played in the background with ninja-like skills, making it perfect for a game night, casual party, or other social gathering.

To play, hand out one “You Lose!” card to every player. Each player has until the end of the game session to slip their card somewhere where another player will be forced to find it. Amongst other cards of a game currently in play, in their chips, etc. Be creative! And don’t get caught! When a "You Lose!" card is found by another player, that player is out. The last player standing wins.

192714.name: Roleplaying Tips (Issue 647)
192714.description: Adventure Tips for Urban Fantasy Games

192715.name: Roleplaying Tips (Issue 648)
rpgissuearticle: One Unique Thing For Your NPCs

192717.description:
All players play as thieves who are pulling bills out of a wallet stuffed with cash. What none of them know, is any player may be an undercover cop, trying to catch as many thieves as possible.

In Pickpockets, players will take turns either drawing or manipulating money cards in a wallet until a player reveals themselves as an undercover cop, yelling “Hands up”. All other players will reveal their cards.
The Undercover Cop Wins if at least one other player has two or more marked bills in their possession.

Otherwise the Pickpocket with the most money wins.

Alternatively a player can skip town if they have enough unmarked money in their possession.
192717.name: Pickpockets

192718.name: Bukkake!
192718.description: Bukkake! takes a classic fetish and turns it into a fun card game that mixes strategy and luck. It's weird, addictive, and makes for a very interesting game night. The goal of the game is to "come" on the player in the middle of the circle and get them out. If you're the last player standing, you win! Despite how it sounds, Bukkake! is not erotic and does not require anyone to literally ejaculate. While the theme of the game is clearly sexual, that's about as far as we take it. None of the cards are pornographic-all imagery is euphemistic. For example, the genital named "the spicy pepper" is just an image of a chili pepper. The only exception is the vagina card, which depicts an anatomy textbook-style vagina. It's not pornographic. We felt society is underinformed about female anatomy and wanted to educate in a weird way.

192720.name: Roleplaying Tips (Issue 651)
rpgissuearticle: How to Switch to Mapless Combat
192720.description: Mapless Combat and Making Class Matter

192722.description: The definitive travel game. At the start of a trip, the group will draw a card from each of three categories (easy, medium, hard) and they will keep their eyes peeled for School Buses, Bears, Superheroes, and more. The first player to spot and claim one of each is the winner.
192722.name: Cow Tiger Santa Claus

192724.name: Roleplaying Tips (Issue 654)
192724.description: How to use meddling gods to make life very interesting for your characters

192725.name: 1,372 Roadside Encounter Ideas
192725.description:
Inspiration for your game's travels

From the introduction:

Sometimes a GM needs a little inspiration. Especially for the frequent question of, "So, what happens while we’re on the road?"

User summary:

A greatly expanded version of 100 Roadside Encounter Ideas

192726.description:
Legend of Vyas is a two-player strategy card game based on the the Mahabharata. Each player chooses a hero from the story and builds a deck of warriors, weapons, spells, astras, advisor, artifacts, and formation. Each player then uses these cards on the Kurukshetra battlefield in an attempt to reduce the opposing hero's health to zero. Cards are in general closely linked to the way the characters, spells and weapons are used in the epic itself.

In game's initial release, the available heroes are the legendary bowmen, Arjuna and Karna.

Each game set comes with 3 unique Indian stick-dice that determine a player's energy allowance for using cards.
192726.name: Legend of Vyas

192727.name: 7 Ways to Instantly Improve Your GMing
192727.description:
From the introduction:

The following tips and advice is aimed at game masters looking to improve their craft. We can always be a better GM, even if we grey hairs have been running games for decades.

In this PDF you will find great techniques for becoming a better GM. You can apply them instantly to your games, but some will take awhile to master.

192728.name: Ranglin' Rabbits
192728.description:
Description from the publisher:

It's a bunny break-out! A herd of hasty hoppers is headed for the hills, and it's your job to halt them. Work together as a team in Ranglin' Rabbits to corral the cottontails by flicking, lifting, and rolling the dice. But hop to it! There's trouble afoot if they all escape before you can mend the fences. Wrangle the rabbits and you're a 24-carrot champion!

192729.name: Jump Ship!
192729.description:
Description from the publisher:

As the captain of the Black Bounty, it's up to you to chart your own course through this pirate Cardventure! Should you defend your boat from enemy pirates, or do you go and plunder another ship? Do you duel your fearsome nemesis Captain Peg, or do you jump into the squid-infested waters? Choose wisely in Jump Ship! as your fate depends on the choices you make! Whether you play solo or with a friend, the goal is the same: Grab the most gold!

192730.name: Baba Yaga
192730.description:
Description from the publisher:

Behold the saga of Baba Yaga! Use spells, potions, and a bit of luck to capture the legendary sorceress. Summon an enchanted owl or a plucky pelican to help you, but only if you can concoct the proper potions first.

Think strategically and stay alert in Baba Yaga because the card game could end at any moment! Get the lowest score and conjure up a win!

192731.name: Skiwampus
192731.description:
Description from the publisher:

Outmaneuver your opponents in this full-tilt action brain-builder! Arrange your tiles in Skiwampus so that the corners connect to form an array of patterns, whether most colors, all numbers, three of a kind, or more. But work quickly because everyone plays at the same time! It's a geometric jam that requires sharp eyes, quick thinking, and nimble hands. Let the wild Skiwampus start!

192732.name: The Surge
192732.description:
UNRELEASED GAME – UNAVAILABLE




This game has officially been announced by the publisher or developer, but has not yet been released and made available for purchase. Therefore some of the information above may change in the future. Until this game is released, please do not submit images for it, nor add new releases. Press Kits are an exception and a maximum of six can be added.




User Summary

Players will assume control of a survivor in that world, an ordinary man who wears a powerful, industrial-grade exoskeleton. It's not express built with military combat in mind, but that's where the game's crafting system and modular upgrades will come in.

192733.name: 5150: Fringe Space
192733.description:
5150 Fringe Space is about living life on the edge. Sometimes that means salvaging space wrecks, hunting space pirates, or hauling cargo and passengers from one world to the next.
But it also means carousing in a city, rescuing crewmembers from Alien abductors, and fistfights in a low end bar. 5150 Fringe Space is a RPG Lite game that can also be played as a man to man or ship to ship combat game. Inside you’ll find:

A variety of Classes, Attributes, Professions, and Alien Races to make your characters unique.

Man to man combat rules for when you’re on a planet.

Ship to ship combat rules for when you’re out in Space.

Rules for character improvement that rewards you when you succeed and brings you down when you don’t.

Light bookkeeping Campaign and Economic systems that enhance the game instead of bogging it down.

Color paper character and space ship counters.

And much more…

5150 Fringe Space is designed to be played solo or same side against the game mechanics, but also works just as well when played head to head against your friends.

Playable with any figures you may already have or just with the paper counters we’ve included. Play it any way you want, just play it!

192735.description:
Broom Service: The Card Game focuses on the brave/cowardly mechanism used in the Broom Service board game (and before that Witches' Brew).

Additional Comment

This game is #2 in the Alea very small box series. It includes an expansion for the Alea big box series game Broom Service.
192735.name: Broom Service: The Card Game

192737.name: What Lies in the Shadows Under the Trees
rpgseries: Campaign Kits: Fantasy Adventure Plot Points
192737.description:
From publisher blurb:

n the following pages you will find a series of ten short, encounter-based adventures which are designed to be inserted into any forested setting along the path of your existing campaign or on their own. They range from first to sixth level. Consider throwing one or more of these little side treks in as a way to spice up an otherwise uneventful forest crossing, as part of a larger structured campaign, as a short one-off, or even as a seed for a more involved adventure.

These adventures are designed with a party of four PCs in mind. Each adventure indicates the average party level that the adventure was designed for.

Campaign Kits: Fantasy Adventure Plot Points is a product line that provides short adventure plots to help aid in filling your campaigns downtime. Each Plot Point provides enough details for you to quickly drop them in your game and are perfect for creating a series of exciting side stories.

192738.name: Treasures of the Earth I
192738.description:
From publisher blurb:

You Want Me To Drop The Hammer?!

Based on the rules presented in The Genius Guide to Relics of the Godlings I & II the Relic Files brings new magic items to your game table. Drawing on historical myth and traditional fantasy tropes, each Relic File PDF presents a new relic suitable for use in most fantasy campaigns.

Forged by the First Smiths from the purest ore, Svarduun - The Black Hammer, is a fixture in dwarven legend. Able to hold spells, flame, and speed up its wielder, this relic is presented in all 20 levels, including a new spell, Aspect of the Forgelords.

192739.name: Primordial 10
boardgamecompilation: Duelo Primigenio: The Rainbow Shoushiling Cards Project
192739.description:
A game played with a Duelo Primigenio deck. It is a changing puzzle where players will have to find the best position to place a card in the card matrix.

Players will place one of their cards ortogonally to other card on the table, forming a matrix of cards with a limit of 4x4 cards.

After playing a card, the player will check the column and row where his card is placed, then he will take to his side every card in that row and column that have the same color and suit of the card played.

The objective of the game is to have the least amount of cards, and with the lower numbers in the side of the player.

Spanish:
Consiste en un puzzle cambiante donde los jugadores deberán encontrar la mejor posición para colocar cada carta en el tapiz de cartas, para así llevarse las cartas que más les convenga para ganar la partida.

192740.name: Arctic FoXX
192740.description:
From publisher blurb:

Based on an original character by Pin-Up model, cosplayer, and roleplayer Jenny Poussin (and used with her permission), Arctic Foxx (PL 10) is Jenny Poussin's heroic alter-ego, a cold based heroine seeking to make the world a better place while protecting it from her nemesis, the evil Black Ice.

192741.name: Elder Godlike
rpgpodcastepisode: Elder Godlike: Beyond the Limits of the North
192741.description:
From publisher blurb:

Elder Godlike is where the superhuman suspense of Godlike meets the cosmic terrors of chtung! Cthulhu, introducing a whole new dimension of fantastic adventures to the Secret War, in the ultimate crossover gaming experience.

Written by original Godlike creators Dennis Detwiller and Greg Stolze, and based on their acclaimed Godlike: Superhero Roleplaying in A World on Fire, Elder Godlike adds battles on a new front as Talented Allied commandos use their amazing abilities to confront super powered Nazi Übermenschen and combat the secret, awful designs of the nefarious Black Sun.

Will your characters embrace the power of their new abilities and powers and can they resist the onslaught of the new super soldiers of the Nazi regime?

Elder Godlike features:

A complete new rule system for superpowers in Call of Cthulhu.
A history of Talents in the Secret War
A complete Elder Godlike adventure
Guidelines for Talents in mass combat
Six pre-generated characters ready to play
Fully compatible with the Call of Cthulhu, Sixth Edition and Savage Worlds roleplaying games.




Elder Godlike is a crossover dossier’s worth of useful alternate historical and fantastical information to help you expand your campaign out into the wider world of the Secret War

You are larger than life - but the Secret War is larger than you!

Against the Dark Yogi: Ready-Made Heroes is a supplement for Against the Dark Yogi. It's features include:

192759.name: Mystic Marketplaces: The Brass Drake
192759.description:

The goal of Mystic Market Places is to add an aura of mystery and enchantment back to shopping; a shopping experience that transcends the Walmart mentality that has infected some games.

Each instalment will deliver interesting role-play worthy staff, a compelling local, adventure hooks, and of course unique wares. It is also where we introduce a patronage sub-system which enhances a GMs ability to make shopping an engaging and interesting encounter.

The Brass Drake is one part shop one part mystery where time doesn't seem to move at exactly the same pace or even direction as it does elsewhere. The shop keep Maurice is a peculiar fellow with soem dangerous secrets and very interesting wares..

192761.name: Oh Bleep!
192761.description:
Race against the clock to form as many words as possible by adding vowels and consonants to letter cards. Earn points for only those words that have not been written down by any other player AND include, in any order, ALL three consonants in play on the Letter Pot Board. The longer the word, the more points won. At the first sighting of an Oh Bleep! Card, be the first to shout, “Oh Bleep!” and gain advantages over other players.

Oh Bleep! is not your grandpappy's word game. Select one of three game-play options: (1) Zany, (2) Brainy, or (3) Bleepin' Crazy (combining both types of challenges). Depending upon the game selected, be prepared to perform comical, daring physical feats and/ or overcome brain-busting challenges. But watch out! Don't let yourself be distracted from your word-creating, opponent crushing goal. After all, only the player with the most points wins.

192762.name: Gauner raus!
192762.description:
Time to get the crooks out! First you need to zero in on them, then they'll be over and done.

In Gauner raus! you get to learn more about the possible hideouts of the opponents' crooks round by round, but each player needs to discover for themself where exactly those crooks are hiding. Play cleverly and make the right guesses to become a master detective!

192785.name: Polynesian Voyage
192785.description:
Polynesian Adventure is a fun and educational board game for families. The game is a voyage through the Pacific Ocean visiting several of the islands of Polynesia. Players race to the island of Hawaii as they learn about numbers, islands in Polynesia and life in the Pacific.

Gameplay
Every player starts their Pacific island voyage at the bottom of the board game. To advance, each player draws a card in turn and follows the directions provided on the cards. Number cards have varying amounts of fish on them, along with the accompanying numeral to help children learn to count and associate numerals with the counting. The player then uses that number to follow the fish along the path. There are also "bonus" cards in the deck. These cards can instantly transport a player to an island or move other players around the board. For example, the "Hurricane" card moves the player at the front of the game back six spaces. There are also bonus spaces on the board that allow players to take shortcuts on their voyage or to lose turns. The first player to arrive in Hawaii wins.

192787.name: Sora
192787.description:
The beautiful blue sky is getting painted darker each passing moment.

War.

People killing each other.

No one even knows who started it anymore.

No one even knows how long they have been fighting against each other, forgetting what they are fighting for.

People have made themselves into weapons to snuff others out,
forgetting their dream of flying freely in the sky.

The war has been lasting forever.
But the end seems to be at hand.
The population has seen a massive decrease,
and the whole planet as the battlefiled is on the verge of destruction.

Knowing all that, people have become weak and keep warring without getting hurt themselves.
That way, they are merely postponing the inevitable.

During the war, a girl was born.
Her name was Sora.
She was born with a power for fighting.
She was not happy about it, but the people around her were and they sent her to the battlefield with no thought for her feelings at all.

The last war on the worn-out planet.
Whether it is won or lost, there would be nothing left.

Sora did not know the meaning of the fight.

192800.description:

This game has officially been announced by the publisher or developer, but has not yet been released and made available for purchase. Therefore some of the information above may change in the future. Until this game is released, please do not submit images for it, nor add new releases. Press Kits are an exception and a maximum of six can be added.




Rogue to Redemption is the story of Shawn O’Conner, a young man living on the streets of Sardonia. On one fateful night, he is given the chance to make a new future for himself – or die trying.
The mysterious castle of Hero-University is full of danger, but also filled with opportunity. There are chances to make friends, acquire wealth, and learn the skills that a young rogue needs to succeed.
Shawn can look for romance or search for lost treasure. He can help others or focus upon his own goals. When he learns the truth of his father’s death, will he seek the path of vengeance or that of forgiveness?
The choice is yours…
